characters

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • visual.dynamic.described.AbstractSprite
      • characters.Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    event.MetronomeListener, visual.dynamic.described.Sprite, visual.statik.SimpleContent, visual.statik.TransformableContent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Player

    public abstract class Character
extends visual.dynamic.described.AbstractSprite
    Character abstract class that has a position and coordinates each point of the character.
    Author:
    Kevin Amrein and Affan Sheikh

      Character(int xPosition, int yPosition, int pointCount)
      Creates a Character at (xPosition, yPosition) and initializes the corner coordinate array to pointCount.

      • Character

        public Character(int xPosition,
                 int yPosition,
                 int pointCount)
        Creates a Character at (xPosition, yPosition) and initializes the corner coordinate array to pointCount.
        Parameters:
        xPosition - int X Coordinate
        yPosition - int Y Coordinate
        pointCount - int number of vertices in the character polygon
